sourceMeaningMnemonic: You have an <radical>alcohol</radical> <radical>nine</radical> times stronger than any other drink in a bottle shaped like a <radical>cross</radical> and you drink it all and become <kanji>drunk</kanji>. You’re like, so drunk right now from all that alcohol. Nine times more drunk than ever before.
meaningInfo: Feel how drunk you are as you look at the cross shaped bottle that once held the alcohol. See the cross start to blur in front of you from how drunk you are.
readingMnemonic: If you drink so much that you become <kanji>drunk</kanji>, then your alcohol will begin to taste like water. What is the reading of <ja>水</ja>? It's <ja><reading>すい</reading></ja>, which is the reading for this kanji.
readingInfo: Speaking of <ja>水</ja>, you need to drink some. You need to rehydrate and <ja>水</ja> is the best way to do it. Drink a lot of <ja>水</ja>. Go. Now.
